title: App Store Business Manager - UK & Ireland, parental leave
summary: The App Store is the world's largest and most innovative software store, serving hundreds of millions of Apple customers. Looking for a dynamic individual with a passion for the business of apps to help support developers in the UK and Ireland.
description: Manage and expand business relationships with developers from small businesses to large organizations. Provide expertise to help them make better decisions, analyze metrics, work closely with developers and cross-functional groups within Apple, identify market trends, and collaborate on promotional campaigns.
preferred_qualifications: An ability to analyze and communicate results clearly and effectively, proficiency in Excel/Numbers and Keynote, track record of creating and delivering presentations to large and small groups, outstanding organizational skills, ability to work with international peers.
